solution_line_template: The pasta is ${pasta_cost}, the sauce is ${sauce_cost} and the meat is ${meat_cost} for a total of {pasta_cost}+{sauce_cost}+{meat_cost} = $<<{pasta_cost}+{sauce_cost}+{meat_cost}={total_cost}>>{total_cost}
He wants to stretch this meal into {num_servings} servings so each serving will cost {total_cost}/{num_servings} = $<<{total_cost}/{num_servings}={cost_per_serving}>>{cost_per_serving}
